gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
ADJUNCT
or
REPORT VB

sense.def:
To inquire about something
pomeni vprašati za podatke o nečem;

seg.quote: He went to enquire about the times of trains to Edinburgh.
He inquired whether it was possible to leave his case at the station.
‘What will it cost?’ inquired Miss Musson.

sense.def:
To inquire after someone
pomeni vprašati, kako nekomu gre.

seg.quote: She enquired after Mrs Carstair's daughter, who had just had a baby.

sense.def:
To inquire into something
pomeni nekaj preiskovati.

seg.quote: The police inquired into the deaths of two young girls.
